body: Sure, I put it here ( https://gist.github.com/jakirkham/b57a2f20e54d3d7ffd1c ). However, I think that it was the `gcc` frontend that was causing this problem and just now I have gone through the build successfully by setting clang/clang++ in the environment variables `CC` and `CXX`. Though I'm guessing there is no C++ code involved here so the latter is probably unnecessary.
